post.text: Join me LIVE in Sanford, FL!

comment.author: Haley
comment.text: Obama is here in California to fundraise for his sidekick Killary spending our money to fly around instead of doing his job, those two are two peas in a pod.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Careful of the scumbag that messaged you. "Wickham Jeremy" He's soliciting women. My mom got hooked very briefly by one of these crooks before I made it right. I messaged every girl on his page when I found out he was soliciting women like this pos is doing to you. This guy said the exact same thing as what some other guy told my mom two years ago. What a shame we live in a world like this were people like him do that to innocent women. He's been saying that on many many posts on here targeting women. Please be careful.
